title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Intensive Training for Mastering Thoracentesis Procedures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge, understanding of respiratory anatomy, and foundational clinical skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: By the end of the 1-week short course, learners identify anatomical landmarks (ribs, clavicle, sternum) in thoracentesis simulations with 90% accuracy and perform procedures while fully complying with OSHA sterile technique 5-step protocol (hand disinfection, glove use, sterile drape application, sterile equipment use, waste disposal)

Learners perform thoracentesis procedures applying clinical judgment to three standardized patient scenarios, meeting eight or more of ten checklist items and achieving 4+ points (5-point scale) on the simulation evaluator rubric
Achieve a minimum passing score (MPS) or higher in skill proficiency as set by an expert panel
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
